author: Special Correspondent
text:
A baby girl born a few days ago was found abandoned near the Mainguard Gate here on Wednesday.

Wrapped in a piece of cloth, the infant was found abandoned in front of a shop.

Police sources said the security guard of a jewellery shop heard the cries of the infant in the early hours and alerted the police. The baby was later handed over to the Government Hospital for medical care.
title: Baby girl abandoned at Mainguard Gate
